April 8, 1979 D North East Midlands Contest (Second Section)
North East Midlands Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest North East Midlands Contest north-east-midlands-contest-second-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Civic Theatre, Mansfield, Nottinghamshire Prizes - 1st £45 and trophy, 2nd £35 and trophy, 3rd £25. March contest - 1st Hucknall Linby, 2nd Shirebrook, 3rd South Derbyshire Miners. 4 bands competed.
Jan. 3, 2015, 1:54 p.m. March 29, 2017, 10:41 a.m.
1 Newstead Brass B. G. Wilkinson
2 Gresley Colliery Band P. Hannam
3 Long Lea Valley Royce Pritchett
4 Shirebrook Band Seth Appleton
